title: Bug 11866: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: Bug 11866: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
OB:
The label "Test Classes to be included" is written as "TestClasses" (missing space).
The status line mentions "methods" being selected instead of "types".
The action name is written as "TestSuite" instead of "Test Suite".
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Update Test Suite dialog.
2. Observe the labels mentioned above.
3. Check for any other inconsistent or incorrect labels in the dialog.
